thread.title: Four Springs Capital, LLC Adds Gregory Kammerer to its Capital Markets Team

author: cnbc.com
title: Four Springs Capital, LLC Adds Gregory Kammerer to its Capital Markets Team
text:
LAKE COMO, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Four Springs Capital, LLC announced today that it has hired Gregory Kammerer as Senior Vice President on its capital markets team. Mr. Kammerer will focus his efforts on representing Four Springs transactions primarily with family offices and institutional investors.
Mr. Kammerer brings nearly a decade of experience working with family offices and institutions within the real estate and private equity sectors. Prior to joining Four Springs Capital, Mr. Kammerer worked at a private equity real estate fund, working on nearly $500,000,000 of value add real estate transactions. Mr. Kammerer rejoins Four Springs Capital where he originally started his career.
“We are pleased to welcome Greg back to the Four Springs team,” said chairman and CEO William Dioguardi. “His extensive industry experience and relationships combined with his strong track record of business development and raising capital will help the company continue to expand its reach within our distribution channels.”
Mr. Kammerer graduated cum laude from Monmouth University, where he was a member of their track & field team. Mr. Kammerer earned his Juris Doctor from Seton Hall University School of Law where he focused his studies on taxation and securities law. Additionally, Mr. Kammerer is a trustee of Sigma Tau Gamma Foundation where he serves on the Investment and Audit Committees.
For more information regarding this announcement or Four Springs, please contact Charles Shaw at (732) 749-7344 or info@fsctrust.com .
About Four Springs Capital, LLC:
Four Springs Capital, LLC is a financial services firm that focuses on raising capital for real estate and other alternative investments.
